title: Bodacious Lindsey Pelas Attempted To Do Handbras, But Failed Miserably Because She’s So EXTREMELY Well-Endowed (15 PICS)
text:
According to the heavily utilized Boobapedia, spectacular Lindsey Pelas has size 32F breasts. Those enormously perfect size breasts enable her to always offer someone a pillow and they provide hours and hours of entertainment. However, when attempting to do a handbra with a size 32F breast can be difficult to say the least. 

There’s just so much juicy real estate to cover. 

Sometimes you have to broaden it from a handbra to an armbra in an attempt to secure all of that goodness. 

Other times you have to enlist the services of a fireman’s helmet to cover up those pleasure orbs. 


Just give up already. 

You can’t stop them, you can only hope to contain them. 

Sometimes you have to ask a friend to help conceal your sweater puppets. 

I’m not saying that I’m not willing to lend a helping hand to accommodate Miss Pelas.
